data.title: ANELLO Photonics and Mythos AI are collaborating to enhance resilient navigation for maritime autonomy by enabling plug-and-play, GPS-denied capabilities for next-gen platforms. News from Feb. 26, 2026.
data.description: A partnership has been formed to develop seamless GPS-denied navigation features for upcoming sea vessels. ANELLO Photonics, known for their Silicon Photonics Optical Gyroscope (SiPhOGâ„¢), is leading this initiative. The collaboration, centered on advanced maritime technologies, is set to revolutionize navigation for future vessels. The announcement was made in Santa Clara, California on February 26, 2026. This joint effort aims to enhance navigation capabilities for next-generation maritime platforms by utilizing cutting-edge technology. A major focus of the project is to ensure plug-and-play functionality to navigate without GPS assistance.

data.title: Billion-dollar automotive mega-projects make up 50% of global capital expenditures, with average plant investment increasing by 24%. Site selection now prioritizes execution reliability over incentives.
data.description: Automakers are increasingly finding themselves in direct competition with data centers and semiconductor producers due to growing manufacturing demands. Execution reliability has emerged as the primary factor influencing site selection decisions, surpassing incentives. Elements such as power availability, permitting processes, and workforce accessibility are now critical considerations for automakers aiming to meet the complex manufacturing needs of the industry.

data.title: Chemours plans to offer $600M in senior notes due 2034, subject to market conditions.
data.description: In Wilmington, Delaware, on February 26, 2026, Chemours Company (NYSE: CC) disclosed its plan to propose $600,000,000 in total principal amount for new senior notes set to mature in 2034 (the "Notes"), contingent upon market factors and other conditions. These Notes will hold a senior position...

data.title: Zavation buys ChoiceSpine, making Derek Kuyper CEO, on Feb 26, 2026. It's a portfolio company of Gemspring Capital, designer of spinal implants.
data.description: In Flowood, Mississippi on February 26, 2026, Zavation Medical Products, LLC disclosed their acquisition of Choice Spine Holdings. Zavation, supported by Gemspring Capital, specializes in creating spinal implants, interventional spine products, and biologics. This development marks a significant transaction in the medical industry.

data.title: ArisGlobal launches NavaX Translation to automate global pharmacovigilance translations with TransPerfect, enhancing LifeSphere Safety workflows.
data.description: ArisGlobal, a leading AI-first technology company in the life sciences sector, announced their partnership with TransPerfect Life Sciences on Feb. 26, 2026, in Boston. This strategic collaboration will integrate certified, pharma-grade translation services directly into LifeSphere Safety workflows. The partnership aims to enhance efficiency and accuracy in translations within LifeSphere Safety processes. This development highlights ArisGlobal's commitment to innovation and excellence in the life sciences industry.

data.title: Kettering Foundation grants 5 Global Fellowships for 2026 to leaders in various fields to uphold democracy.
data.description: In Dayton, Ohio on February 26, 2026, the Charles F. Kettering Foundation revealed the selection of five exceptional individuals for one-year global fellowships. These leaders hail from diverse backgrounds such as politics, journalism, and law. The fellowship aims to support them in their efforts to safeguard democracy.

data.title: Oakland School highlights 77th summer camp enrollment at Horse World Expo, offers unique academic & equine programs.
data.description: A specialized independent school in Central Virginia, Oakland School, is highlighting its distinctive academic and equine programs and has revealed the availability of summer boarding opportunities. Located in Charlottesville, the school caters to students with language-based learning variances. The announcement was made on February 26, 2026. This unique institution offers a blend of academic curriculum and equine activities for its students. For those interested in exploring the offerings during the summer, boarding options are now open for enrollment.

data.title: Correction: Lindblad Expeditions Holdings, Inc. reports 2025 Q4 and full-year financial results. Conference call at 9:00 am EST.
data.description: Lindblad Expeditions Holdings, Inc. has announced their financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2025. The conference call regarding this update is scheduled for 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time.
